Class: Mouse

input/mouse. Mouse

new Mouse(canvas)

Creates a mouse input handler and starts listening for mouse events. You don't normally need to create this since the engine creates one by default.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
canvas HTMLCanvasElement Mouse position will be relative to and constrained to the limits of the given canvas.

Members

x :Number

The mouse X position, relative to the left-hand-edge of the canvas.

y :Number

The mouse Y position, relative to the top of the canvas.
